ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Talendor
ygData.msgSnippet: I saw a fellow selling a red and green dragon scale in ec one day, promptly asking him why in Tunare s great Norrath would he do that? He was looking for a
ygData.messageBody:
I saw a fellow selling a red and green dragon scale in ec one day, promptly
asking him why in Tunare's great Norrath would he do that? He was looking
for a Mryolkar (sp?) BP. I thought to myself of course, don't we all?
(sarcasm)

He told me that while passing through EJ one day, he was observing a guild
getting smeared by Severilious. It was actually a close battle, so he said.
I suppose their last dragon hunter fell to the ground, he walked up and
nuked (not on his rogue) the poor cute little dragon to its death. Lo and
behold, 2 dragonscales. I have no idea what he decided to do with the other
items that dropped, if any. But I suppose it does happen in some far off
galaxies sometimes. Bards never get solo dragon kills :-( hehe
